con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://yukon.cannontech.com/service" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:sch="http://yukon.cannontech.com/api" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://yukon.cannontech.com/service"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://yukon.cannontech.com/api" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:yukon="http://yukon.cannontech.com/api"> <xsd:simpleType name="AccountNumber"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="SerialNumber"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="UnboundedLimit"> <xsd:union memberTypes="xsd:positiveInteger yukon:UnboundedLimitWord"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="UnboundedLimitWord"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="unbounded"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="emptyElement"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:anyType"/> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="Token"> <xsd:attribute name="value" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="ThermostatMode"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Auto"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Cool"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Heat"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Off"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ThermostatFan"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Auto"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Circulate"/> <xsd:enumeration value="On"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TemperatureUnit"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="F|C"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="Temperature"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:double"> <xsd:attribute name="unit" type="yukon:TemperatureUnit"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="OptOutType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ENABLED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DISABLED_WITH_COMM"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DISABLED_WITHOUT_COMM"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="HardwareClass"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SWITCH"/> <xsd:enumeration value="THERMOSTAT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="METER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GATEWAY"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="nonNegativeInt"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A 32 bit non-negative integer.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="YukonMessage"> <xsd:attribute name="version" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="yukonUser"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="extra"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:any processContents="skip"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="Success"/> <xsd:complexType name="Failure"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="errorCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="errorReference" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="errorDescription" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SimpleSuccessOrFailure"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="success" type="yukon:Success"/> <xsd:element name="failure" type="yukon:Failure"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ControllableDevice"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="accountNumber" type="yukon:AccountNumber"/> <xsd:element name="serialNumber" type="yukon:SerialNumber"/> <xsd:element name="deviceType" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ControllableDeviceResult"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="accountNumber" type="yukon:AccountNumber"/> <xsd:element name="serialNumber" type="yukon:SerialNumber"/> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="success"/> <xsd:element name="failure" type="yukon:Failure"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="EnrolledDevicesByAccountNumberRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="accountNumber" type="yukon:AccountNumber"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="startDateTime" type="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Start date time is not required. If not provided, then current enrollment information should be returned.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="stopDateTime" type="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Stop date time is not required. If not provided, then current enrollment information should be returned.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="enrolledDevicesByAccountNumberRequest" type="yukon:EnrolledDevicesByAccountNumberRequest"/> <xsd:complexType name="EnrolledDevicesByAccountNumberResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="enrolledDevicesList" type="yukon:EnrolledDevicesList"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="failure" type="yukon:Failure"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="EnrolledDevicesList"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="enrolledDevice" type="yukon:EnrolledDevice"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="EnrolledDevice"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="serialNumber" type="yukon:SerialNumber"/> <xsd:element name="programsList"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="programName" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="enrolledDevicesByAccountNumberResponse" type="yukon:EnrolledDevicesByAccountNumberResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="EnrollmentRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="enrollmentList"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="programEnrollment" type="yukon:ProgramEnrollment"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="enrollmentRequest" type="yukon:EnrollmentRequest"/> <xsd:complexType name="ProgramEnrollment"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="accountNumber" type="yukon:AccountNumber"/> <xsd:element name="serialNumber" type="yukon:SerialNumber"/> <xsd:element name="loadProgramName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="loadGroupName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="applianceCategoryName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="appliancekW" type="xsd:float"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="relay"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:positiveInteger"> <xsd:maxInclusive value="4"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="seasonalLoad" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="EnrollmentResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="enrollmentResultList"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="programEnrollmentResult" type="yukon:ProgramEnrollmentResult"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="enrollmentResponse" type="yukon:EnrollmentResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="ProgramEnrollmentResult"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="accountNumber" type="yukon:AccountNumber"/> <xsd:element name="serialNumber" type="yukon:SerialNumber"/> <xsd:element name="loadProgramName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="loadGroupName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="success"/> <xsd:element name="failure" type="yukon:Failure"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ManualThermostatSetting"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="serialNumber" type="yukon:SerialNumber"/> <xsd:element name="mode" type="yukon:ThermostatMode"/> <xsd:element name="fanState" type="yukon:ThermostatFan"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="heatTemperature" type="yukon:Temperature"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="coolTemperature" type="yukon:Temperature"/> <xsd:element default="false" minOccurs="0" name="holdTemperature" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="NewControllableDevicesRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="controllableDeviceList"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="controllableDevice"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:ControllableDevice"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="deviceLabel" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="fieldInstallDate" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="serviceCompanyName" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="newControllableDevicesRequest" type="yukon:NewControllableDevicesRequest"/> <xsd:complexType name="NewControllableDevicesResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="controllableDeviceResultList"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="controllableDeviceResult" type="yukon:ControllableDeviceResult"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="newControllableDevicesResponse" type="yukon:NewControllableDevicesResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="ProgramUnenrollment"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="accountNumber" type="yukon:AccountNumber"/> <xsd:element name="serialNumber" type="yukon:SerialNumber"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="loadProgramName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="loadGroupName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="applianceCategoryName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="appliancekW" type="xsd:float"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="relay"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:positiveInteger"> <xsd:maxInclusive value="4"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="seasonalLoad" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RemoveControllableDevicesRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="controllableDeviceList"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="controllableDevice"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:ControllableDevice"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="fieldRemoveDate" type="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="removeControllableDevicesRequest" type="yukon:RemoveControllableDevicesRequest"/> <xsd:complexType name="RemoveControllableDevicesResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="controllableDeviceResultList"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="controllableDeviceResult" type="yukon:ControllableDeviceResult"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="removeControllableDevicesResponse" type="yukon:RemoveControllableDevicesResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="RunThermostatProgramRequest"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This web service sends a command to the list of thermostats, which causes them to run their thermostat program.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="serialNumber" type="yukon:SerialNumber"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="runThermostatProgramRequest" type="yukon:RunThermostatProgramRequest"/> <xsd:element name="runThermostatProgramResponse" type="yukon:SimpleSuccessOrFailure"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This web service sends a command to the list of thermostats, which causes them to to run their thermostat program.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="SendDefaultThermostatScheduleRequest"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This web service sends the default thermostat schedule to the thermostats supplied.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="serialNumber" type="yukon:SerialNumber"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="sendDefaultThermostatScheduleRequest" type="yukon:SendDefaultThermostatScheduleRequest"/> <xsd:complexType name="SendDefaultThermostatScheduleResponse"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the response returned from sending a default thermostat schedule. The sending of the default thermostat schedule is is done through the sendDefaultThermostatScheduleRequest.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="success"/> <xsd:element name="failure" type="yukon:Failure"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="sendDefaultThermostatScheduleResponse" type="yukon:SendDefaultThermostatScheduleResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="SendManualThermostatSettingRequest"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This web service sends out a manual thermostat settings to a thermostat, which allows someone to change their current temperature, fan type, and mode of their thermostat..</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="manualThermostatSettingList"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="manualThermostatSetting" type="yukon:ManualThermostatSetting"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="sendManualThermostatSettingRequest" type="yukon:SendManualThermostatSettingRequest"/> <xsd:element name="sendManualThermostatSettingResponse" type="yukon:SimpleSuccessOrFailure"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the response returned from sending a manually thermostat setting command. The sending of the manual thermostat setting command is is done through the sendManualThermostatSettingRequest.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="SendTextMessageRequest"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This web service sends a text message to a thermostat.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="textMessage" type="yukon:TextMessage"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="sendTextMessageRequest" type="yukon:SendTextMessageRequest"/> <xsd:complexType name="TextMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="messageId" type="xsd:long"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="serialNumber" type="yukon:SerialNumber"/> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="confirmationRequired" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="displayDurationInMinutes" type="xsd:long"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="startTime" type="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="Requested"> <xsd:attribute name="initiated" type="xsd:int" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute default="0" name="failedLookup" type="xsd:int" use="optional"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="InvalidMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="messageId" type="yukon:nonNegativeInt"/> <xsd:element name="serialNumbers" type="yukon:SerialNumbers"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SerialNumbers"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="serialNumber" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="LookupError"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="serialNumber" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SendTextMessageResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="requested" type="yukon:Requested"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="lookupError" type="yukon:LookupError"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="failure" type="yukon:Failure"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="invalidMessage" type="yukon:InvalidMessage"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="sendTextMessageResponse" type="yukon:SendTextMessageResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="SendThermostatScheduleRequest"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This web service sends the supplied thermostat schedule to the thermostats supplied.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="serialNumber" type="yukon:SerialNumber"/> <xsd:element name="scheduleName" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="sendThermostatScheduleRequest" type="yukon:SendThermostatScheduleRequest"/> <xsd:complexType name="SendThermostatScheduleResponse"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the response returned from sending a thermostat schedule. The sending of a thermostat schedule is is done through the sendThermostatScheduleRequest.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="success"/> <xsd:element name="failure" type="yukon:Failure"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="sendThermostatScheduleResponse" type="yukon:SendThermostatScheduleResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="UnenrollmentRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="enrollmentList"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="programUnenrollment" type="yukon:ProgramUnenrollment"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="unenrollmentRequest" type="yukon:UnenrollmentRequest"/> <xsd:complexType name="UnenrollmentResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="enrollmentResultList"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="programEnrollmentResult" type="yukon:ProgramEnrollmentResult"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="unenrollmentResponse" type="yukon:UnenrollmentResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="UpdateControllableDevicesRequest"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="controllableDeviceList"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="controllableDevice"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:ControllableDevice"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="deviceLabel" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="fieldInstallDate" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="serviceCompanyName" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="updateControllableDevicesRequest" type="yukon:UpdateControllableDevicesRequest"/> <xsd:complexType name="UpdateControllableDevicesResponse"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="yukon:YukonMessage"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="controllableDeviceResultList"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="controllableDeviceResult" type="yukon:ControllableDeviceResult"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="updateControllableDevicesResponse" type="yukon:UpdateControllableDevicesResponse"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="removeControllableDevicesRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:removeControllableDevicesRequest" name="removeControllableDevicesRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendDefaultThermostatScheduleRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:sendDefaultThermostatScheduleRequest" name="sendDefaultThermostatScheduleRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="unenrollmentRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:unenrollmentRequest" name="unenrollmentRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendTextMessageRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:sendTextMessageRequest" name="sendTextMessageRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendThermostatScheduleRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:sendThermostatScheduleRequest" name="sendThermostatScheduleRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="runThermostatProgramResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:runThermostatProgramResponse" name="runThermostatProgramResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendManualThermostatSettingResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:sendManualThermostatSettingResponse" name="sendManualThermostatSettingResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendDefaultThermostatScheduleResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:sendDefaultThermostatScheduleResponse" name="sendDefaultThermostatScheduleResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="enrollmentResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:enrollmentResponse" name="enrollmentResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="updateControllableDevicesResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:updateControllableDevicesResponse" name="updateControllableDevicesResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="runThermostatProgramRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:runThermostatProgramRequest" name="runThermostatProgramRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="enrollmentRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:enrollmentRequest" name="enrollmentRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="newControllableDevicesResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:newControllableDevicesResponse" name="newControllableDevicesResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendManualThermostatSettingRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:sendManualThermostatSettingRequest" name="sendManualThermostatSettingRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="updateControllableDevicesRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:updateControllableDevicesRequest" name="updateControllableDevicesRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendTextMessageResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:sendTextMessageResponse" name="sendTextMessageResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="unenrollmentResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:unenrollmentResponse" name="unenrollmentResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="enrolledDevicesByAccountNumberRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:enrolledDevicesByAccountNumberRequest" name="enrolledDevicesByAccountNumberRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="newControllableDevicesRequest"> <wsdl:part element="sch:newControllableDevicesRequest" name="newControllableDevicesRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendThermostatScheduleResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:sendThermostatScheduleResponse" name="sendThermostatScheduleResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="extraHeader"> <wsdl:part element="sch:extra" name="extra"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="removeControllableDevicesResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:removeControllableDevicesResponse" name="removeControllableDevicesResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="yukonUserHeader"> <wsdl:part element="sch:yukonUser" name="yukonUser"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="enrolledDevicesByAccountNumberResponse"> <wsdl:part element="sch:enrolledDevicesByAccountNumberResponse" name="enrolledDevicesByAccountNumberResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="starsPort"> <wsdl:operation name="sendThermostatSchedule"> <wsdl:input message="tns:sendThermostatScheduleRequest" name="sendThermostatScheduleRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:sendThermostatScheduleResponse" name="sendThermostatScheduleResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="sendTextMessage"> <wsdl:input message="tns:sendTextMessageRequest" name="sendTextMessageRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:sendTextMessageResponse" name="sendTextMessageResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="runThermostatProgram"> <wsdl:input message="tns:runThermostatProgramRequest" name="runThermostatProgramRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:runThermostatProgramResponse" name="runThermostatProgramResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="sendManualThermostatSetting"> <wsdl:input message="tns:sendManualThermostatSettingRequest" name="sendManualThermostatSettingRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:sendManualThermostatSettingResponse" name="sendManualThermostatSettingResponse"/>
